caption: My wife and I had a class with Chef Gustavo. Amazing experience. The venue (his home) was spacious and laid out well, he was very prepared and he not only explained his own cooking techniques but also the cultural history of each menu item served. I learned things I can use at home (he places an emphasis on this) and he made me want to visit other countries I’ve never been to. It was a great experience and I highly recommend.

Had a phenomenal date night courtesy of Chef Tiffany. The night was interactive, educational, fun and most of all, a memorable one. The food was delicious and the recipes were easy to follow under her instruction.  Would absolutely recommend and look forward to working with Chef Tiffany again.

This was our first time and we did the sushi making class. The Chef took his time and made sure everyone was at the same place. Even though there were 16 of us on Zoom, it wasn't distracting. Our Chef was personable and explained everything perfectly.  The class was interactive, so if we needed to ask a question, we could do that. There was one couple who had a problem with their rice. He gave a tip and it worked! That's helpful in case we ever run into a problem in the future. We will definitely be doing this again! Thank you Chef Made Master.
We made donuts with a Meg. She was awesome. She made everything easy and enjoyable!!! We had a super fun experience that we would definitely do again.
Tiffany was wonderful. Very professional, very knowledgeable and a fabulous cook.
We had such a good time with Chef Made on Sushi mania! He was funny, engaging and clearly loves what he does.  We highly recommend this experience and would do it again!

Had a great time learning to make sushi with Chef Made. Thank you again and can't wait to put our newly learned skills to practice! I believe the pics attached show some awesome looking sushi for first timers :).

Loved the Peruvian food with Chef Gustavo 👍🏼 He was very nice, passionate about food and cooking. He shared lots of  knowledge tips and tricks with us. This was my first experience with Cozymeal and I enjoyed it!
Chef Gustavo is amazing. This is the perfect idea for a date night, a night with friends, or if you simply want to go solo and learn! I would recommend this to all ages and occasions.
Our second time taking Chef Meg's class and it was just as enjoyable as the first! We had so much fun making pasta from scratch and would definitely recommend it to anyone wanting to learn.
I enjoyed it and it gave me confidence to try frying.
Sushi Maki Mania with Chef Made Master was amazing!!! He is a wonderful, patient, and kind teacher. I have recommended him to all of my friends.
We did a team building activity with Chef Gustavo.  It was a lot of fun.  We learned a lot and ate extremely well.  Definitely an amazing experience!
Enjoyed this class with Chef Yolande. She has a warm bubbly personality and was very engaging. This was my first class with cozy meal and will not be my last. The dish and dessert were delicious!!!
Had an amazing time learning to cook with Chef Gustavo. He provided us with many useful tricks, a great meal and wonderful evening. We will definitely do again soon.

We had an amazing time preparing a meal with Chef Chericia.  Our entire experience far surpassed our expectations.  Chef Chericia was a great teacher and we learned a lot that will help us produce tasty food. Most amazing was the meal she/we made.  Not only was the menu fabulous but there  was so much food that we invited friends at the spur of the moment to join us. We all agreed that the empanadas were best we have ever eaten. Chef Chericia’s paella was also wonderful with lobster tails shrimp and chicken to accommodate my mollusk allergy.  As we approached time to eat we started on the churros churros - eat dessert first!
I have not tried this company yet.
We had an amazing time with Chef Meg! She was an amazing teacher and great and funny to boot! The food was incredible, and the whole experience is highly recommended!

I took one of Cozymeal cooking classes in DC with Chef Tony and it was a fantastic experience. We cooked several seafood dishes and enjoyed a nice meal that we had all contributed to. I highly recommend Cozymeal to anyone looking into learning new cuisines or a fun activity with a friend.

The experience with Chef Cherica and Joy was absolutely amazing.  From the greeting when we arrived, to the food instruction and preparation, to the eating and socializing, STELLAR!!!!!  Such an awesome teambuilding experience for my group.  They are still talking about it!  Thank you for the experience!

Highlight of my trip to DC.  Chef Gustavo is interesting, informative and friendly.  I felt like a welcome guest in his home while we prepared amazing food, drank wine, and learned a lot about food and its preparation/presentation.  I'll definitely be doing this again.

My fiancée and I celebrated her birthday dinner with Chef Meg, and another couple. It was an amazing experience overall and we learned so much! Not only is she an amazing teacher, she's also a comedian. It makes me wonder if she should pursue stand-up comedy, in addition to being a chef as well! We don't think we could have had such an amazing experience anywhere else and were lucky to have worked with her. Her dog, doug, was also a great host and hopefully we can work with her again for the future!

I booked a Meatless Italian Cuisine and was looking forward to it but the morning of, I received a cancelation from the Chef, who was ill. I was upset because it was 2 hours before hand and I looked forward to it with my niece who was in town for a few days. But hey, things happen, right? I expected a refund but I did not get one. Odd since. I should not to have to contact anyone since it was canceled. I then followed up with their service email. 7 days later, still no response. I understand things happen but when YOUR company cancels, how about giving me MY money back?! Now I have to do a credit card dispute. So annoying!

Recently had a small team building event with Chef Gustavo.  He was friendly, very knowledgeable about the food we cooked and the Caribbean culture. The food was absolutely delicious! His kitchen was very small, so our group of 7 felt cramped and the high temperature in the room really took away from the overall experience.

Chef Meg was fantastic! She was organized, had a sense of humor and a GREAT Chef.  The food we made was amazing...I just hope that when I make it at home it taste the same, lol.  I will definitely use her again!

Our sushi experience with Chericia was great! We had such a good time, the sushi was delicious, and Chericia was lovely.  There was so much food - definitely worth it and we learned a lot. It was such a good experience, I've already recommended it  to multiple friends.
Experience: "Night of Spanish Tapas" with Chef Chericia  was INCREDIBLE. Chef Chericia was amazing and we will definitely be doing another Cozymeal experience with her!

I had a great time at Chef Made Master's Sushi Maki Mania class. I learned so many valuable things in making those wonderful rolls. And it was so much fun eating  the beautiful  things we created! I would definitely recommend Chef Made!

My experience with Meg was awesome! She is awesome. The food was exceptional. Truly a one of kind experience. Highly recommend anyone and everyone take a class with Meg. Currently looking into other classes with her. She inspired me to get in the kitchen and make new dishes. I can't wait to buy a homemade pasta noodle maker. 😍❤️
This was a great experience! My wife enjoyed it and the food we made was delicious!

Two friends and I took the Fresh and Seasonal Italian class with Chef Meg and it was an incredible experience! Meg, her home and her adorable pup Doug were all super welcoming. Meg tailored her demonstrations to our skill levels and I left the class inspired to remake the dishes sometime soon. As an added bonus, Meg is hilarious and kept us cracking up the whole time. I can't wait to go back and take another one of her classes!

Our experience with Chef Meg far exceeded all expectations. From the moment we walked into her darling and stylish apartment, we felt like we had known her all our lives. She was warm, inviting, knowledgeable, experienced, and hilarious to boot. Her experience is impressive but she’s very humble, patient and accommodating. We had varying experience and interest levels of cooks and Meg was able to teach and inspire each of us. The food was delicious and so approachable. I would absolutely recommend Chef Meg and look forward to cooking with her again!
We had a fantastic time making sushi with Chef Made Master! Would definitely recommend him and the cozy meal experience!Great date night!

I bought a cooking class for my grandson for his birthday because he wants to be a chef. Chef Tiffany came to my house and taught us how to make a delicious 3-course meal. She was terrific!  So patient and knowledgeable and friendly. She is very professional and very good at what she does. I highly recommend Chef Tiffany.

Wow - what an amazing Italian cooking experience with Chef Malik! We scheduled this cooking class for two - and Chef Malik and Cozymeal did not disappoint! We learned so much about classic Italian cooking including the right spices and herbs to use, making anchovy paste in a wooden bowl, making fresh pasta, delicious fettuccini alfredo sauce and chicken, and strawberry shortcake, all in my own kitchen! I can't wait to make this meal again - and I'm already planning my next cooking class with Cozymeal!

Chef Sally was a delight to have as our personal chef.  Her knowledge of cooking French cuisine is noteworthy.  My Aunt, a fine cook, in her own right, enjoyed sharing cooking experiences with Chef Sally.  It was a very memorable evening that all of us enjoyed thoroughly.  All of us highly recommend Chef Sally for large or small parties.  She is a class act and a wonderful chef!!!!

Chef Gustavo is wonderful host who makes a cooking class enjoyable, friendly and very informative. The class was very welcoming and Chef Gustavo knows a lot about the latin america cousine. He gave us very helpful recommendations of cooking and how to make dishes good looking and delicious. My fiance and I had a really good time. Than you Chef Gustavo!
Chef Gustavo was personable, passionate and a great cook. He was both a good teacher and a story teller. We had a great time and enjoyed the cozy, intimate cooking environment.

Chef Chericia came to our house to teach us how to make sushi as a gift to my boyfriend for his birthday! She was so great, such a wonderful teacher and we would absolutely have her back! This was hands down one of the best experiences we have had and will definitely be using CozyMeal for all of our cooking lessons in the future!
Had a fantastic experience with Chef Gustavo learning to prepare a 4 course Peruvian meal. Every bite of each dish was like a party of flavors. Thank you Chef Gustavo and Cozymeal.

This was a great date night. Chef Malik was wonderful and funny.  He also went out of his way to ensure the whole meal was Gluten Free.  He develop a Gluten Free homemade pasta recipe and we made pasta together, he brought GF french bread he baked that afternoon so i could have garlic toast and croutons my caesar salad.  I have not had croutons in years. Even desert was with GF cookies and an amazing filling. If you have dietary challenges Chef Malik is you guy!

Chef Malik was amazing! It was such a fun evening! He is an incredible chef! We made a fabulous dinner that was interactive and delicious. He came extremely prepared and was efficient. I definitely recommend Chef Malik!

I purchased a class with chef Meg for my husband’s birthday. We learnt how to make donuts) that was a fun experience. It would be fun to do everything ourselves (including mixing the dough, frying the donuts)  but I understand that the format is a bit different and it would take much longer. So I appreciate that everything went well and smoothly. Chef Meg is a charming and very pleasant person.

We had a wonderful experience with Chef Meg! She was personable and well-versed on the nerdy science behind cooking, which my husband enjoyed. Meg is loaded with exciting stories about her life and chef travels and likely has the ability to put even the most awkward at ease! She taught me basic knife skills and how to chop an onion without crying or cutting my finger! This was a great experience for an 1123rd date with my hubby and money well-spent. 😂
Chef Judith’s meatless lasagna recipe was amazing. We also had a great time cooking. Thanks for all of the helpful tips!
Great experience! Chef MadeMaster was extremely knowledgeable and patient with his teachings.  Brilliant chef.  Food was fantastic.  5 stars all around!

We had a fantastic time with Chef Gustavo. The food was delicious, and there was a good combination of hands-on learning as well as demonstrations. He was a wonderful host and a phenomenal chef -- I would definitely recommend, and would return!

We had a wonderful time with Tiffany! She was prompt, courteous and knowledgeable!  She showed us how to prepare a wonderful meal of home made pasta with a wonderful shrimp butter sauce, a yummy salad and a delicious bread pudding.  She brought everything needed and cleaned up along the way.  Couldn't have asked for a easier or more delicious Sunday meal.  I was a little nervous when she said we were going to make the pasta, but it was so easy that I can do it again myself.  I also learned a few tips along the way.We will definitely use her services again

We took the “French and Italian for two” with Tiffany. We had a great time. Chef Tiffany was fantastic—she was on time, super-friendly and -fun, and helped us prepare an amazing three-course meal. More cooking in two hours than our neglected stove and oven had seen in their entire lives. 😂😂  Also really appreciated that Tiffany brought all the food and appliances that she needed, AND cleaned up as she taught, so the kitchen was spotless when she left.  And the food was so good! In sum, highly recommended for a fun date night.
Chef Tiffany was great with my 12 year old and me who isn't a cook. There were a ton of smiles and questions!

Chef_Cece came out to our home and walked my wife and I through cooking Shrimp Etouffee, hush puppies, remoulade, and bananas foster.  We had a wonderful time and she was a joy to work with.  We highly recommend chef_Cece or Chef Chericia.
Chef Maed Master was exceptional. Knowledgeable and flexible. We had a great time.

We had an incredible experience with Chef Kisha!! We indulged in the "Farm to Table" meal, and it was absolutely delicious. From the laughs, to the meal prep, to the cooking tutorials given by Chef Kisha; the evening was exactly what I anticipated. This was a special experience/surprise for my significant other, and Chef Kisha did an amazing job aiding to make it that much more special. Would definitely do it all over again with the same chef, same meal.
Chef Sally was a great teacher to learn from and talk to about cooking, seasoning, and a wide range of food. I would definitely recommend her!

We had a great time with Chef Kenny.  We invited 2 of our good friends and neighbors.  Chef Kenny prepared three dishes, we learned and ate delicious foods.  It was such a nice way to host a dinner party without the stress.  I would definitely recommend it.

We had a wonderful night with Chef Meg! For those in the DC area, I highly recommend Meg, she made us feel comfortable and felt like part of the group. We made an amazing meal that I've already recreated portions of, and can't wait to make in full again! I absolutely plan to book an event with Meg again in the near future.

Our “Italian cooking” experience with Chef Meg far exceeded our expectations. She is as much a teacher of tips and techniques for authentic cooking as she is comic. We laughed our way through the 3-course meal and preparation. And we can replicate the dishes on our own. Thanks Meg
I had a wonderful evening with Chef Gustavo. Great recipies! I enjoyed both learning and eating. Chef Gustavo shared with us a lot of tricks on how to cook and buy good food.

Chef Malik came to our home and wowed us with his knowledge and abilities. He taught us the difference between spices and herbs, broth and stock, and so much more. We loved our chicken curry and rice pudding. Three days later, we'll still enjoying our leftovers. His mobile kitchen was impressive and his plating skills out of this world. Thank you Chef Malik!

I think it was an amazing experience. Chef Meg  had everything prepared beforehand. We enjoyed her company, the food and the way we interacted with her. This definitely was a great idea for a date with my girlfriend.
What a great date night!! Learned some new techniques, new recipes, and had a wonderful time with the chef!

This is one of the best gifts we've ever been able to give our kids: Letting them explore the kitchen in the hands of a truly masterful, creative, talented chef. The meal was just amazing. But the experience with Chef William was priceless. They will keep the skills and stories they've learned tonight for years to come!

What a great evening! We made sushi with Chef Chericia and our granddaughter (age 8). Chef Chericia was knowledgeable, an excellent teacher, patient, and encouraging. She is confident, kind, gentle and was very good  with our granddaughter who can't wait to tell her friend who loves sushi!  I'm happy to find Cozymeal and will do more. The sign-up process was easy, scheduling was flexible, and all communication with reminders and follow-up were excellent. Thank you!
Excellent experience with Chef Kenny and his French cooking class! Highly recommend!
We did an at-home cooking lesson as a team event with Chef Kenny and it was so fun having him show us some tricks of the trade while also getting to enjoy a delicious meal.  Highly recommend!

This was a wonderful Boxing Day (that is the day after Christmas) activity for my family. Chef Gustavo was knowledgeable and entertaining. The food he helped us prepare was delicious. The atmosphere was warm.

I got this as a Christmas gift for my mom & aunt and I’m so happy I did! Chef Cher was such a delight to work with! She was well-prepared and the meal was well choreographed. She was so sweet and friendly, answering all of our questions with ease and cheerfulness. We even added a third person (me!) a few days before and she was so accommodating.  We loved spending time with her and were so pleased that she was so generous with both her time & her knowledge. Not to mention, our “Night in Italy” meal was delicious!! Plus, we even had left overs!  Look forward to working with her again!

Highly recommend!! The whole experience from booking with Rosario to the meal prep with Chef Cher was awesome. Chef Cher was very patient and knowledgeable. Her guidance and support through the process was amazing.  It was great to see that some of my colleagues have pretty good cooking chops. 😉  We typically switch up our team events, but I would love to do it again if I'm not out-voted.

My compliments to Chef Gustavo and his team.  My team (work colleagues) have expressed what a great time they had with the “Colorful Caribbean Cuisine” team building experience. The atmosphere at the home of Chef Gustavo was very inviting and friendly. The food demonstrations, explanations about the culture and cuisine as well as the culinary tips were very helpful.  We participated in some of the food preparation, which made it fun.  The food was delicious and the overall experience was superb.  This was an excellent choice for our group year-end activity and highly recommend it.

My sister and I had an amazing experience with Chef Kisha! From the moment she arrived she exuded warmth and friendship. She was so pleasant and accommodating to our individual cooking skills. She gave us tips for using spices, tricks for meal prepping, places to buy fresh produce nearby, etc. She got us involved in all aspects of cooking and it wasn't intimidating at all. Most of all she was very personable, it was like having an old friend stop by for a visit. We really enjoyed our time with Chef Kisha and we will most certainly book her again soon.
Great Meatless Italian class with Chef Judith. Wonderful food and lots of fun!

Chef Gustavo was charming, knowledgeable and accommodating. His genuine passion for cooking in general and Spanish/Latin fusion specifically came through. Intimate and comfortable setting, delicious food, techniques that are reproducible even for a novice. This was a lovely experience which I highly recommend.

We had the BESTTTTTTT time!!! Chef Gustavo was an amazing chef who provided an amazing experience! My boyfriend and I will definitely be returning to another class with him/what an amazingly nice guy! Thank you so much Chef Gustavo for making it a great Saturday cooking class!
We celebrated our anniversary with Chef Meg. She is the best Chef and host

My wife and I celebrated our first anniversary with Chef Gustavo and it was an extraordinary experience; especially for a couple that enjoys the entire meal experience. Nowadays it is too common to go out to a restaurant for dinner but this was such a refreshing experience. Chef Gustavo was an outstanding host! Extremely hospital, patient, and obvious love for cooking and sharing his passion through experience. I would repeat this evening again without hesitation.
We had a fantastic team event with Chef Chericia!  We are looking forward to setting up another event with her in the future.
My wife had a wonderful time cooking her Vegan Latin Infusion Birthday dinner. Chef Gustavo was excellent and made us feel right at home.

Chef Judith was amazing! She is quite personable and was able to teach us both by example and just by speaking us through each step. We were paired with another couple, and both the husband of that couple and myself are quite gregarious, but Judith was able to keep us in check most of the evening. The food was spectacular and we will definitely make the courses again here at home.

Chef Meg was a delight!! She was confident, funny, and knowledgeable. The dishes she prepared were on point!! Perfectly prepared, flavorful, and all things we would make again. We are still talking about the fun we had and it will be a happy memory for years to come.

We had so much fun making sushi for our 11-year-olds birthday party.  The girls loved cutting the vegetables and making the rolls--and were so happy and excited to see that they came out just like what you might get at a restaurant.  Excellent!
My wife and I had a great experience and enjoyed cooking with Chef Kisha. The Farm To Table Cooking Class and our time together was both fun and delicious.
Chef Cheri was amazing.  We did a big Italian dinner as a team building event for work.  She was personable, friendly, and really helped us make an amazing meal. Would definitely book her again!
Chef Gustavo presents a menu unique to his background and a region of cuisine we weren't familiar with. The food was delicious and it's clear Chef Gustavo has a real passion for the food he prepares.

This was our first experience with Cozymeal. I booked Chef-Gustavo for a surprise anniversary date with my wife. Chef-Gustavo is professional and very talented. If you’re looking for an amazing experience, this is your Chef.
Had the best time with Chef Judith! She was so personable and the class was fun and DELICIOUS! Bought it as a gift and it was wonderful would highly recommend!

We had a team retreat and had a fantastic time with Chef Chericia. I had no idea pasta was so easy to make. We worked in small teams and could move from one group to another so it was great to spend time with different team members. This is a great team-building or just-for-fun experience.

Had a wonderful time at Chef Gustavo's "South American" themed cooking class. The food was amazing, simple to make and diverse. I will definitely be making these recipes for myself/friends in the near future. The class isn't the most hands-on, however for the sake of time I understand that we wouldn't be able to do every step of each recipe. Hope to try another class soon!

Chef Meg was friendly, fun, and encouraging. We did the donut class as a birthday present for my 8 year old daughter, and Chef Meg did a great job of explaining the concepts and making the experience fun and hands-on. We feel confident we could try this at home, and my daughter is so proud of the delicious donuts she made. Doug is a very supportive helper as well!
Chef Gustavo was amazing!! So charming and warm and a sweet man! His kitchen is cozy and inviting.  We loved every part of the meal (fusion date night). Highly recommend.
Best cooking experience ever ! very easy to understand and delicious results

Chef Meg was amazing, the food couldn't have been better and she had us howling laughing the whole time. We did Duck, Duck, Mousse and everything was cooked to perfection, we're going to try and mimic it at home. Plus, her sous chef (dog) Doug was adorable. We will definitely be back.

We just got back from our WONDERFUL cooking experience with Chef Meg. She was so sweet! She took the time to explain everything, answer all of our questions and just such a great chef, host, teacher and new friend all around! We would definitely recommend her! The food was great and the company was awesome! P.S. Douglas the souschef was the cutest😍.

Chief Judith is amazing! My friends and I registered for the "Meatless Italian Cuisine" course. We learned a few knife skills and learned the difference between dicing and quartering, though I think I might need a whole class on just knife skills. We also made a white sauce from scratch! If you love cheese, you will love this class. Everything was declicious! We hope to take another class from Chief Judith soon.

I bought my wife and I a class with Chef Gustavo for her birthday, and it was great! Chef was very welcoming, and the Peruvian food was amazing. The class isn't the most hands-on cooking experience in the world, but you definitely pick up a few tips to use around the kitchen. Plus, if you're at all curious about the restaurant business and what goes on behind the scenes, Chef will be able to dish about that all night long.
We had a great experience with Tiffany! We learned some nw cooking skills and had great conversation. The meal was awesome too!

We had a great night learning to make ceviche, lomo saltado, and more with Chef Gustavo. He was extremely knowledgeable, warm, and great at explaining not only how to make each part of the meal, but also why he took each step he did, and what the each item on the menu meant to him. Highly recommended!

My boyfriend and I had a great time cooking with Chef Gustavo. He was friendly, encouraging and skilled, and he showed us how to make 4 delicious South American dishes. The intimate and more casual setting is really nice. Was a fun night and a lot of good food!

Our class was with chef Judith. She was amazing and Knowledgeable.  We learned a lot in her class. We had an amazing time and the food was so good. We would definitely take a class with her again in the future.

We had an awesome night with Chef Meg for a Belgian night out!  The menu was amazing (especially if you love carbs like I do.) Meg was so welcoming and easy to coordinate with, and she was also hilarious.  I will be seriously upset if she does not create her own YouTube channel.  Best of all the recipes were not overly complicated and we both left feeling like we could actually replicate all of the courses!  Thanks for a great night Meg (and Doug!) we had a blast!

We booked Chef Kisha's Farm to Table Class for an after work team event. Chef Kisha and her sous chef were amazing. We shared endless laughs, learned a ton about cooking and seasoning food, ate an incredible meal.... well done, Kisha! I would recommend this class to anyone who is looking to learn about eating and preparing healthy & delicious meals, or those just looking to have a good time with a very special and talented chef. Thank you, Kisha!

Lovely evening with the chefs.  There was less "class" than we were expecting but everyone still had an amazing time and the food turned out great.  Chef Gwyn and her team were a delight to deal with (even after we were so late due to traffic).  Thank you.

Chef Sher was amazing!  She taught us (adult and two teenage girls) how to cut, roll and prepare sushi rolls.  She came with everything we needed and brought the freshest and best quality ingredients. We not only learned a lot but the final outcome looked beautiful and tasted even better. HIGHLY recommend!
Chef Gustavo was a great at hosting. He shared his background and passion with what he does and really kept it hands on.  The food came out amazing.

We absolutely loved our cooking experience with Chef Gustavo. He took us on a journey through South America and we loved every moment. He shared a lot of cooking tips and relevant information about the flavors and recipes. He is extremely personable and easy to talk to. We plan to do this again!

Chef Gustavo was amazing! He was incredibly friendly and welcoming of us into his home, made great conversation and was very relatable when teaching us cooking skills. His passion for cooking and food really comes through as he interacts with his customers. Hands down, I would recommend this experience to anyone and will be coming back for another meal!

We had an absolutely lovely date night with Chericia teaching us how to make sushi! It was such a a treat having someone come to our house with all of the ingredients and a plan- that's sometimes the hardest part! Figuring out what to make, but Chericia was fun and patient with us as we attempted to roll our sushi! The night was delightful and we were eating the leftover sushi for days. Couldn't recommend it more! She's awesome!

We would give Chef Gustavo a 5 out of 5!  The whole experience was wonderful.  Every course was delicious!  We enjoyed getting to know Chef Gustavo on a personal level.  His passion for cooking is off the charts!  It was fun learning some cooking and food prep techniques.

Chef Gustavo was one of the most professional and personable people we have ever had the experience of dealing with. Our evening was most enjoyable and educational. We would highly recommend an event to to anyone interested in a cooking class event. The dishes were exceptional and unbelievably simple. Thank you, Chef Gustavo. Al and Pam.

Although I'm not new to cooking, my recent class with Chef Meg was one of the most enjoyable cooking experiences I've ever had!  With humor and  a lively pace, Chef Meg does an amazing job of using her classical training and extensive culinary experience to give novices the tools to succeed in the kitchen and to provide even experienced cooks with techniques to take their cooking to the next level.   This class far surpassed my every expectation and I would highly recommend Chef Meg to anyone who loves good food, good cooking and the pleasure of sharing both with other people.  You won't be disappointed!

I cannot say enough about how great this cooking experience was with Chef Meg. I took my mom for her birthday and we had an absolute blast. Chef Meg taught us a lot about cooking and the meal was amazing and something that I could replicate on my own. Not only was the cooking fantastic, but Chef Meg is so welcoming, friendly and funny. We laughed the entire time that we cooked. This was my first time attending a cooking class and it was an experience I will never forget. Thank you Chef Meg for your lively energy and smile- you are great!
Chef Gustavo was fantastic. Very instructive and in tune with our familiarity and level of understanding of the cuisine.  The food and ambiance was amazing and would definitely recommend.

As a Mother’s Day gift, I took my mom to a class taught by Chef Meg. Meg was absolutely fantastic (so was her pup Doug, who worked quality control) and we learned so much from her. We left with some tasty treats and also feeling like we had known her for years. I would not hesitate to recommend Chef Meg to anyone, and I’m looking forward to booking my next class with her!

My team and I had a wonderful time with Chef Chericia. Not only was the food delicious, but Chef Chericia had a very positive attitude (despite some unforeseen obstacles) and was very patient with her instruction. We were a very large group of people, which has its own challenges, but everyone walked away with a smile on their face and very full stomachs! Thank you.

We took Chef Judith's vegetarian italian class and it was wonderful. The lasagne was the best I've ever had, and the other courses were amazing too. Learning from the chef was fantastic. I highly recommend.
It was great!!! had an amazing evening and awesome new food
We had a great time with Chef Judith. The vegetable lasagna especially was amazing!

This was an amazing experience. Chef Gustavo was the consummate host and instructor! He shared knife and preparation tips with us in addition to showing us how to cook an amazing 4-course meal. The food was superb and he was a great entertainer as well. Thanks so much Chef! We look forward to coming back!

Cannot say enough about how wonderful our experience was. Chef Chericia was personable, talented, and fun to hang out with for an evening.  The food was great and a fun learning experience.  Will definitely reserve again.

This was a birthday present for my wife and she was not let down at all.  Chef Meg was amazing!  We felt like we were in our own home, despite being guests at her apartment.  The dinner was lighthearted, fun, and entertaining.  Meg is just one of those individuals you want to be around.  Despite just having met her, we felt comfortable like we were around a friend.  She even has a little sous chef, named Doug.  He was just as friendly.  The food was great, and Meg taught us how to make everything, including hands on with the pasta.  I was able to go home and make my wife Bruschetta that weekend.  Overall, I can not recommend this enough.  Totally worth it.  You will not be dissapointed.

Cannot say enough things about how fabulous this experience and chef meg are! Chef meg arrived with every appliance and gadget required to make a spectacular meal. Her cooking was fantastic and her spirit was infectious. Her love for cooking is so authentic, and her stories so fun—she’ll have you laughing as she curates your meal. She provides helpful information along the way but also does much of the work. For us, she was the perfect amount of everything—informative, playful and talented.  I have already begun plotting how I can see her again, and what meal would be next!

Chef Meg was great!  We had a great meal- like fine dining brought to your home- and she had so many great anecdotes and tips about cooking. She showed us the whole process, answered all of our questions (we had quite a few), and made it fun. It was the right balance of instruction, interaction, and relaxing while someone else does the work that we were looking for. Definitely a great value in comparison to going out for a good meal, since its obv BYOB!

Cozymeal was fantastic to work with. They over communicated and made sure everything was clear and easy. We even had to change the time of our event last minute and they went way above and beyond to work with us. Cher, our chef, did a great job. She was engaging and knowledgeable. Our group had a great time and we'd definitely use Cozymeal again to book a cooking class.

I cannot say enough good things about our experience with Chef Meg. She was such an accommodating, gracious, personable, amazing chef and host, and everything we could have hoped for. From the moment I heard back from her via Cozymeal, to her coming out to my boyfriends apartment cook with us, I couldn't have imagined anything better.  We had a bit of a snafu in that I ended up suffering from a stomach bug on the night of our dinner, which Meg still graciously made for my boyfriend and saved me some for when I was feeling better. My absence was no hinderance, though, as he still had a great time and delicious meal (Duck, Duck, Mousse, by the way). However, Meg in all her awesomeness reached out the next day and subsequent days to inquire how I was feeling, and we were ultimately able to reschedule a time to do our dinner in full, this time at her place. She and sous chef Doug (he's a dog, and he's the best) gave us one of the best meals of my life, made exceptional by her humor, wit, cooking skills, and relatable food (and life) tips.  I feel like I could go on and on about our experience(s) with Meg. If you want quality food and to meet one of the best people to exist - you can't go wrong!

Meg was wonderful, and made the whole experience so fun. She was super funny, and welcoming, and explained each step really clearly. We did the Italian class, and the whole meal was absolutely amazing. Chef Doug was the perfect addition, and I can't wait to follow his instagram account! We loved the whole experience and can't wait to do another class with Meg soon!

We took the Italian seafood class with Chef Judith. She was extremely welcoming, knowledgeable and helpful. The recipes she taught us to cook were amazing, and I learned a ton in her class. I would highly recommend Chef Judith!

Chef Meg is amazing! She goes the extra mile to make the cooking class a blast. My husband and I attended the Duck, Duck, Moose class for his birthday, and we had a wonderful time. The food was delicious, we learned a lot, and we laughed a lot. Five stars are not enough to describe our experience with Chef Meg! Can’t wait to book our next class with her!

👩‍🍳 Meg made our entire evening amazing from start to finish. We chose the Italian option, which was perfect for us, and Meg was well versed in teaching and simultaneously preparing the meal for us. In addition to the meal being beyond delicious, Meg's personality elevated the experience to the next level. Although not needed for us, it is wonderful to know that she can bend over backwards to accommodate most any dietary restrictions. We would highly recommend Meg to anyone looking for a personal chef or culinary immersion.

Chef Judith was awesome! My sister and I attended the vegan cooking class, and we had a great experience. We learned techniques with the knives and made 3 tasty recipes. The cream of mushroom soup was out of this world! I would definitely recommend Chef Judith’s class.

Chef Meg was amazing. My girlfriend and I had a great time with her and Doug. The food was absolutely fantastic. She is very knowledgeable and gave us many tips that we use in the kitchen today. The night was filled with many laughs. We would definitely do it again and recommend her to anybody. Don't miss out on the awesomeness of Meg
Amazing night with Chef Judith. Very knowledgeable and personable. Highly recommend

Was looking for something unique and different for a friends b-day. Stumbled upon Cozymeal and booked a class. We did not know what to expect and were a wee bit apprehensive. Verdict, we had a blast! Chef Judith welcomed us into her home and made us feel like family. It was fun and very educational (how often have YOU made butter?)!
We had such a fun and relaxing evening! The sushi was delicious and chef Chericia was an absolute pleasure. I highly recommend her!

Chef Chericia was so much fun! We were given the Spanish tapas dinner "experience" as a Christmas gift and invited two friends to join us for the evening. Learned some new things about kitchen/food prep as well as discovering some recipes for really delicious food! Lots of fun, lots of good food --- definitely recommend Chef Chericia, we'll be looking to do another one!

My lesson was with Chef Tiffany. She was absolutely awesome. Very personable, explained everything in detail and made the experience extra special due to a birthday celebration. I would definitely have her back over again, and have already told my friends about her. Thank you Chef Tiffany!!!

Chef Judith was amazing. My fiance and I participated in Cozymeal with another couple for Valentine's Day and Judith went out of her way to make us feel comfortable in her home. She was very professional and teaching obviously comes naturally for her. The food she helped us prepare was fantastic (especially the cheese sauce). She even offered to share her recipes with us. 10/10 recommend.
We loved Chef Chericia! Definitely going to do it again 😊
We had Chef Laura come in and teach us about cooking a few mushroom dishes and they were delightful! Would definitely have her again and the service was pretty seamless and easy to use.
Loved cheffing with Chef Judith. She was personable and confident in her cooking. The vegan options were amazing! Def worth trying. Fun date idea as well:)

We had a great class with Chef Judith which we throughly enjoyed! The atmosphere she created was very relaxed and fun. Chef Judith has a real passion for cooking and teaching which was inspiring!  In general it was fantastic, two small points of improvement I would recommend would be to have printed recipes/instructions you can follow along with/use after the class and that we would have had a better idea of what we needed to provide (plates/silverware/bowls) etc. which could have been communicated better.  All-in-all, very fun and a great experience, thanks Chef Judith!

Chef Chericia came to our home and taught my husband and 9-year old daughter to make beautiful, delicious sushi! Cher customized the ingredients to our favorites. She is a pro and we enjoyed the experience start to finish! Highly recommend!

We had a terrific experience with Chef Judith!  Our "class" covered all things Italian," and we so enjoyed the gourmet dishes.  Chef Judith gave us a lesson on proper knifing techniques for chopping ingredients and provided all sorts of helpful tips on how to ensure a perfectly prepared and tasty meal!  The class was at her home, which ensured an intimate and "cozy" experience.  I will definitely recommend her to my family and friends!

We had chef Tiffany come over to our house and teach us how to make pasta as well as two other courses.  She was fun, energetic and super friendly. I can honestly say I would totally do it again!!  The pasta was probably the best I have ever had!

We had a great experience with Chef Judith!! The cooking vegan for two class was a great Christmas gift.  Chef Judith was a great instructor and knows what she's talking about. She was open to questions and gave us the opportunity to do everything ourselves. We learned some new cooking techniques and have incorporated them immediately at home. We would absolutely take another class with Chef Judith in the future, good times!
Chef  Cher was wonderful with our business group and the CozyMeal team was really helpful accommodating with our scheduling needs.

My husband and I received a class with Chef Judith for Christmas, and it was fantastic! We wouldn't have purchased this experience for ourselves, so it was a great gift. Judith was so friendly and made us comfortable right away. Plus, the food was delicious! We were thrilled to have leftovers to bring home for the next day. I would absolutely recommend Chef Judith and Cozymeal to someone looking for a fun night out.
My wife and I took Chef Terri's romantic meal class. Everything was beyond delicious, and we can't wait to make everything on our own!

I signed my BFF up for the Meatless Italian Cuisine.  Chef Judith (Ju Ju) was terrific!  Three of us attended the class.  She admitted that this was the first time she had 3 people attend the course at one time but we couldn’t tell.  She was very pleasant and personable.  She explained all the steps to us and even showed us a few tricks and tips. The food was delish! We had to make doggie bags because it was plentiful. I would recommend and do it again.

I signed up my 7 year old for Chef Tiffany's kids class.  She LOVED it.  Tiffany was terrific. Very nice, friendly and explained all the steps to my daughter.  My only comment is that it would have been good for Tiffany to offer a little more explanation on WHY she was doing certain steps.  But to be fair, I was in the house, but not in the kitchen, so I certainly did not hear all of their conversations.  Also, they should plan to leave the recipes behind.  I would recommend and do it again.  My daughter wants to take lessons with Tiffany!

I signed up my kids and my niece for Chef Chericia's Sushi for Kids class. The class itself was great -- Cece was lovely and the kids (ages 9, 12 and 14) got to do a lot of hands on work. And the end result was beautiful and delicious!  My only suggestion is that she communicate more in advance regarding the logistics of the class. It was school night (only night offered) and she arrived 30 minutes late (she called, it was traffic). But then there was another 20+ minutes of her doing prep (nothing for kids to do), so we didn't start until almost 7 with the kids just sitting around (could have been doing homework). Would have also saved time if she had told me in advance what she would need from my kitchen (knives, platters etc) so I could get those ready in advance. And it would be great if there were a leave-behind recipe/instructions so we feel more confident that we could make on our own.  All that said, the kids loved it, Cece was wonderful and we will be making sushi again.

I set up this experience with Tiffany for my brother and sister-in-law's wedding gift (a surprise!)  They truly enjoyed their time with Tiffany.  She was nice and knowledgeable.  They learned how to make homemade pasta for the first time and raved about the bread pudding.

I wanted to do something different to celebrate my husband's birthday so I decided to do a couple's cooking class at our home with Chef Chericia. I can honestly say that this was a wonderful experience. Chef Chericia is very warm and makes you feel like you can do anything. She is a very patient and knowledgeable instructor. We had a New Orleans menu and the food was outstanding. My husband said it was "finger licking good". By the time, Chef Chericia left, we felt like she was family. I highly recommend her.

My amazing husband surprised me for my birthday with a private cooking class with Chef Judith of Cozymeal.  We have primarily a vegetarian diet (not giving up my seafood;-) and I cannot have dairy, so we selected a vegetarian meal.  From the moment we arrived, Chef Judith was super friendly and approachable.  We felt very comfortable and really appreciated many of the tips she provided not only in food preparation, but tips on how to cut safely, how to create our own spiral zucchini noodles using a mandolin. or her favorite must have spices to keep in stock.  She made us feel right at home and we felt like we were preparing dinner at home with a friend.  Great conversation throughout the evening.  I have already recommended her to others for catering services and will continue to do so.  Looking forward to giving Cozymeal with Chef Judith as a gift in the future.  It's an absolutely amazing gift!  One that I will never forget!!

My wife and I spent the afternoon with Chef Terri last Saturday afternoon. We could not have been more pleased with the cooking session! Opening her beautiful home to us was only the beginning, as Chef Terri offered various recipes, displayed an array of cooking techniques, and made us feel as though we were just welcomed dinner guests invited for an afternoon of great food and fine company.
We had a great time and thoroughly enjoyed the experience with Chef Chericia!!  Great event!
We had a delightful time cooking Southern Soul Food with Chef Chericia.  Chef Chericia was great at explaining the recipes and sharing her knowledge.  The food was delicious.  Would highly recommend!

We had a wonderful time with chef Chericia I organized the sushi cooking class for my boyfriend for his birthday.  It beyond exceeded our expectations.  Chef Chericia came to my apartment and was very patient and detailed in teaching us how to prepare, roll, and cut sushi.  We had a blast and the best part was eating the delicious results.  I highly recommend!

Was confirmed for a corporate event, only to have the chef cancel the day after they had confirmed because "the venue was booked by someone else." Not professional and made me look bad, as I had communicated the confirmation to my boss and my team.
We loved Chef CeCe for spanish tapas. She was very patient and helpful and gave direction without being demanding. Would recommend to anyone looking for great food and cooking skills!

The administrator Rosario confirmed the event for 3PM and on the day the chef informed that the event was scheduled for 3:30 PM. The whole group of 10 people had to wait because chef was unprepared. Chef Chericia was very nice, however she did not introduce herself to the group which was a bit strange. Otherwise we had a great time cooking sushi!

Chef Chericia was amazing, we had the best time! She was patient, talented, and very knowledgable. We not only made the most delicious, restaurant-quality Italian meal, but we also gained knife skills, other cooking techniques, and an affinity for putting effort and skill into food.

Great experience! Totally recommendable! We had  our first Cozymeal cooking class and it was an amazing experience. We all get together and prepared our meal. It was an incredible learning experience and the best part....have a great time with your friends.

Amazing experience, I totally recommend it! You not only learn how to cook from the best chefs in the city (Chericia was our chef and she was just wonderful), but you also have the chance to spend a fun afternoon with friends and eat what you've prepared! Absolutely doing it again soon

We had a fantastic experience with our first Cozymeal cooking class! We were a group of 8 and cooked a delicious meal with Chef Chericia. The food that she brought over was fresh and beautiful, and she not only guided us through the recipe but also taught us some new skills for cutting and preparing the food. The atmosphere was fun and intimate, and the final result was extremely satisfying.  I really enjoy cooking with friends and it was such a relief to have an expert chef there to take all the stress, uncertainty, and disagreement out of the process. An educational and enlightening culinary experience. Would definitely recommend Cozymeal, and for sure plan to do it again.

Do you love to try new foods? Do you like hands on cooking experience? Are you looking for a team-building activity for your company? Cozymeal does it all! From private lessons at your own home for a bday or anniversary to setting up a cooking class at an art gallery or your place of business or renting out a cool AirBNB place to host an event....the talented expert chefs at Cozymeal will show up and make it a fun-filled and delicious gathering!  I went with a group of friends to meet Chef Gwyn. Her motto was all about eating fresh food and staying away from processed food. We learned how to make a citrusy mixed greens salad with fresh glazed peaches, toasted pecans, and Gorgonzola cheese. The combination of these ingredients was absolutely palatable. The dressing was made from fresh orange juice, lemon zest, olive oil, honey and white pepper. Is your mouth watering yet?  Main course was fresh ravioli stuffed with goat cheese mixed with fresh garlic and herbs. We learned how to make it from scratch! It was fun and entertaining and Chef Gwyn taught us many tricks. Fresh pasta is easy to make! Why buy processed!?  Dessert was a hot Chocolate Chipotle Lava Cake with a scoop vanilla and a fresh strawberry. Absolutely luscious and delicious!  We had fun! It was a group of 8. We chatted, drank some wine, made new friends, cooked and learned how easily you can make a fresh, home cooked meal. Stay healthy friends! Stay away from processed foods.

I had a great time at one of Cozymeal cooking classes. At the invitation of a friend of mine I went to Chef Chericia's class in DC. It was better than I expected it. It's more like a dinner party where people are having a great time with food, wine and friends. Oh yeah, you also pick up some useful cooking tip 😉 I highly recommend it!

I used Cozymeal for their tasting with Chef Gwyn in DC. I was impressed by the quality of the food, all the details of the execution in the kitchen. The chef was very knowledgeable, approachable and really easy to deal with. We had a fun experience creating our meal and the hands-on experience was rewarding as well. Whoever enjoys cooking and delicious food, should sign up for CozyMeal cooking classes.

My shift was Tiffany Taylor and she was really awesome and I loved it!!!  Creator is ingenious he's making this for every major city. It was really fun I got to make pasta and I got to make shrimp and I had dessert but tasted really good and Tiffany Taylor who is a high school teacher at  paint branch high school is awesome I love her .  Her style was kind of laid-back and really fun we got to know her and it was very personal and I would definitely recommend her as your chef teacher !

What an interesting concept.  I had the pleasure to witness Chef Gwyn and Chef Tiffany whip out Spectacular dishes.  From appetizers to entrées and deserts.  It was a hands on experience and lots of fun.  I highly recommend cozymeal to anyone who is interested in not just food or it's concept but  how it brings everyone together.

It was a great experience. We have attended one of their classes with chef Tiffany. She teached us how to make Ratatouille and we had it as starter, we baked some cookies and brownies together and it was so much fun. My favorite part was when we made fresh pasta from scratch. As an avid cook, I found the experience amazing. I highly recommend everyone to have this experience, there is something to learn for everyone!
